description.summary: application interface to enable/disable content protection

request.name: desired
request.description: Content Protection is required by the application, for a given surface.

event.name: status_changed

description.summary: An event to tell the client that there is a change in protection status

event.description: This event is sent whenever there is a change in content protection. The content protection status can be ON or OFF. ON in case of the desired protection type is accepted on all connectors, and Off in case of any of the connector content-protection property is changed from "enabled"
